div.head: The wild and wonderful career of a pioneer Asian American writer
div.p: Here is where Mary will write some content that gives a very brief introduction to the site. There will also be a link to some other document, which we will do with a TEI ptr tag (JT TO DO: ADD A PTR TAG to the schema.) There will be a link that says READ MORE that will take someone to that document.

list.item: Pri erat ponderum ne. Homero petentium cu sed. Agam liber partiendo vel ei, eius ornatus nostrum quo ex. Mel ad utinam noster, duo at inani tantas sadipscing. Ut feugiat quaerendum eum, no recteque accommodare complectitur ius, ne sit agam summo. Duo at cibo indoctum, vim odio summo elitr ne, quo eu labore pertinax dignissim.
